title: Task 4.6: Project Dashboard
description: Frontend dashboard for project listing, quick actions, statistics, and recent activity feed. 10 hours. Currently in progress.

title: Task 4.5: Project Setup Wizard
description: 6-step wizard with React Hook Form and Zod validation. Template selection, sprint config, holidays, features. 19 files created. 12 hours.

title: Task 4.4: Public Sharing System
description: Secure 'viewable by link' functionality with token-based public access. Share link generation and management. 10 hours.

title: Task 4.3: Rate Limiting & Abuse Prevention
description: Implement rate limiting (100 req/min, 1000 req/hour) using slowapi. Redis-based tracking. 4 hours.

title: Task 4.2: Excel Generation API
description: API endpoints for Excel template generation with streaming response for large files. Integration with Sprint 3 engine. 8 hours.

title: Task 4.1: Project CRUD API
description: Complete project lifecycle management with Create, Read, Update, Delete operations. PostgreSQL with JSONB configuration storage. 10 hours estimated.

title: Sprint 4: Project Management & Integration
description: Integrate Excel Generation Engine with authentication system for complete project lifecycle. Users can create projects, configure through wizard, generate Excel, and share publicly. 83% complete (5/6 tasks done).

title: Task 5.3: Analytics Dashboard
description: Project analytics with burn-down charts, velocity tracking, and performance metrics.

title: Task 5.2: Critical Path Analysis Enhancement
description: Advanced CPM with resource constraints, buffer calculation, and risk-adjusted timelines.

title: Task 5.1: Advanced Monte Carlo Simulation
description: Enhanced probabilistic scheduling with confidence intervals (50%, 75%, 90%, 95%). Three-point estimation.

title: Sprint 5: Advanced Features & Analytics
description: Enhanced analytics, advanced Monte Carlo simulations, performance optimizations, and advanced reporting features.

title: Sprint 3: Excel Generation Engine
description: Production-ready Excel generation engine with 67 formula templates, 5 default templates, Gantt charts, conditional formatting, and 150+ tests with 89% coverage. Completed in Q3 2025.

title: Sprint 1-2: Authentication & User Management
description: Complete authentication system with user registration, login, email verification, and session management. Tasks included user registration, login, email verification, JWT tokens, session management, and user profiles.

title: Task 6.3: Notification System
description: Email and in-app notifications for project changes, comments, and mentions.

title: Task 6.2: Real-time Collaboration
description: WebSocket-based real-time updates. Multiple users can edit simultaneously with conflict resolution.

title: Task 6.1: Excel Upload & Parsing
description: Parse uploaded Excel files, detect changes, and update database. Conflict resolution with audit trail.

title: Sprint 6: Collaboration & Real-time Updates
description: Version 1.5 - Two-way Excel sync, multi-user collaboration, real-time updates, and notification system.

title: Version 2.5: Enterprise Features
description: Enterprise integrations, SSO, audit logging, advanced permissions, and compliance features. Target: Q3 2026

title: Version 2.0: Intelligence Layer
description: AI-powered features including natural language project creation, task recommendations, and dependency inference. Target: Q2 2026

title: Version 3.0: Multi-Project Portfolio
description: Portfolio management, resource allocation across projects, program-level views, and mobile applications. Target: Q4 2026
